result.title: First Contest
result.content:
It's time for our first contest.

One of the most interesting things about problem solving and competitive programming is contest (Obviously).

The contest is very easy and the problems need simple implementation skills.

You will be given 7 problems and 2 hours to solve them so try to solve as much as you can, as fast as you can, and with the minimum wrong answer.

Your rank will be according to the total points you gain, that the faster you solve the problem correctly you will get more points, every wrong submission you get will cost you a lot of this problem's points.

Remember you can use any source of knowledge on the internet (Google is your friend), but of course you can't use source codes.

Any cheating will lead to disqualification but i think there will be no need for that.

Update:Due to low number of registers, the problems will be replaced with other gym problems and there will be 7 problems. ****

May your scoreboard be full with ACs.
